name: Small Game (FatDeveloper)
description: Hey this is my first complete game that i made for the Micro Game Jam. You really need to check it out. There is no tutorial so you jump, thats all. Please Vote for mine if thats how that works in the snapshots i have one of the files and you can see that the scripts are completely 1 kb so that makes around 5kb total in scripts. Enjoy and happy playin!
